name: Vessel Group, Inc.
description: Provider of an online real time monitoring tool for applications. The company provides a developer platform that allows developers to beta distribute mobile applications, collect real time crash reports and enable in application desk for their mobile applications.
one_liner: Provider of an online real time monitoring tool for applications. The company provides a developer platform that allows developers to beta distribute mobile applications, collect real time crash reports and enable in application desk for their mobile applications.
